data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Cercle Brugge with the kick-off.
Cercle Brugge take a 1-0 lead thanks to Ike Ugbo.
In the minute 22, Karim Belhocine (Charleroi) is making a first substitution, with Amine Benchaib replacing Ken Nkuba.
It's now 2-0 in Bruges as Ike Ugbo scores for Cercle Brugge.
Leonardo da Silva Lopes for Cercle Brugge has been booked by Wesley Alen and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 41, Cercle Brugge's Alexander Corryn has been booked in Bruges.
At Jan Breydel Stadium, Ali Gholizadeh has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Leonardo da Silva Lopes (Cercle Brugge) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Cercle Brugge make their first substitution with Charles Vanhoutte replacing Kylian Hazard.
The home team have replaced Jeremy Taravel with Naomichi Ueda. This is the second substitution made today by Paul Clement.
In the minute 46, Charleroi have kicked-off the second half at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Charleroi have been given a penalty at Jan Breydel Stadium...
Charleroi are back in the match in Bruges. Ali Gholizadeh has scored to make it 2-1.
In the minute 64, Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through a header from Shamar Nicholson.
Goal! Charleroi have got their heads in front thanks to a Ryota Morioka strike.
Massimo Bruno is replacing Ali Gholizadeh for Charleroi at Jan Breydel Stadium.
In the minute 81, Paul Clement is making the team's third substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Thibo Somers replacing Dimitar Velkovski.
Anthony Musaba levels the score at 3-3.
Goal! Massimo Bruno gives Charleroi a 3-4 lead.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-4.
Lukasz Teodorczyk is on a sub for Shamar Nicholson for Charleroi.
Amine Benchaib (Charleroi) gets a yellow card.
